attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If this government is keen to promote health and fitness and beat obesity why is there VAT on gym membership and personal trainers?
To me this governments concern is one fold to bleed as much money as posible out of the working man. The government do not care about health because the ever increasing financial worries on the workers causes constant stress and worry and this puts more of a burden on our GPs this is good for the drug compainies who provide anti depresents millions each year are spent on these drugs. Of course we need to pay tax to maintain the nation but this governemnt is killing us with financial worries. It does not effect the rich or the lazy who will not work it is the people on less then £50,000 a year who are under the most financuial.pressure.

rejection.details: Please reword the main sentence to give a clear action for HM Government
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
